xsd:annotation.xsd:documentation: This is the main schema that defines Applink context required for any Applink based application to interact with Ford backend.

Holds Applink message related metadata for message routing and processing.
ESN = Electronic Serial Number of the module. Can be obtained by the caller in the response for "Decrypt" operation - Optional except... see "Note" below.
Note: ESN is a "Required" attribute for all "encrypt" operation requests that will be sent to Datapower. A soapfault will be returned if ESN is not sent in the header for any "Encrypt" operations.
timeStamp = timeStamp when the message context was created by the provider - Required
correlationId = Unique Id generated by the caller for message traceability - Optional
customerGuid = Global Unique Identifier of the customer with TDI subscription - Optional
